name: ajaxPHPterm
short_description: ajaxPHPterm is an AJAX terminal/shell emulator for PHP, based on the PHPterm project. It acts as a terminal and allows you to execute shell commands within your browser, even in a hosted environment. Added AJAX makes it behave more like a real shell.
